display_name: Overall RDI at 5% desaturation or arousal
description: RDI with arousals at 5% desaturation  [(total number of apneas and hypopneas with arousal associated with >= 5% desaturation) / (hours of sleep)]
calculations: 60*(hremba5 +hroa5 + hnrba5 + hnroa5 +carba5+ caroa5 + canba5 + canoa5 + oarba5 + oaroa5 + oanba5 + oanoa5 + marbpa5 + maropa5 + manrbpa5 + manropa5) / slpprdp
